sqoop.arg: SELECT LkInvIsolatedReasonMSTID,InvIsolatedReasonID,MachineStageTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_LkInvIsolatedReasonMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionChain,Description, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,FromDT,ToDT,DataEntryURI,SPCURI,AcquisitionImageURI,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Comments,Instructions,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,ToolTypeID,NoCavities,Documents,IsSuspendable,IsRotatableStepPlan,EBAReference,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionTypeID,ActionType,Description,ActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetLevelID,AssetID,SubAssetID,Sequence,Comments,FromDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetLevel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartID,ParentPartID,SubPartID,BOMItemID,SubPartQuantityTotal,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Lvl,SortOrder,SubPartQuantity,BOMVariantID,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsAllowExceedBOMQty, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT CommonFaultID,CommonFault,Description,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,ToolTypeID,GaugeTypeID,PartTypeID,RfAssetTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CommonFault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CrnAdapterID,Length,ModifiedDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CrnAdapter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT id,objectid,property,value,uvalue,lvalue,version, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.dtproperties WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT IndividualDefectID,PartInstanceID,Ignored,DefectCount,MeasurementSetID,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.IndividualDefect WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineGroupID,LineGroup,LineGroupCode,Description,OEETarget,WasteTarget,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,AttributeTypeID,LkATATGID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkATATG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartDefID,Sequence,LkCSetCDefID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKCSetCDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIStepID,WorkInstructionStepID,DocumentID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMachineStagePrinterID,MachineStageID,PrinterID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMachineStagePrinter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartTypeID,OperationTypeID,IsInventoryCarriedOver,LkOpTPartTConsumedID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTPartTConsumed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkRootCauseActionID,RootCauseID,ActionID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkRootCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolID,LkTTGID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineGroupID,MachineGroup,Description,IsRetired,RfMachineGroupTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopCategoryID,MachineStopCategory,Description,MachineStageTypeID,StopCategoryCode,DisplayOrder, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopCategory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenancePartUsedID,MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceProcedureResultID,PartID,Cost,DT,LoginID,Quantity,UnitID,InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartUsed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceReasonID,MaintenanceReason, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetRequiredID,EBATriggerID,AcquisitionContextID,MeasurementSetID,RfAcquisitionStatusID,SubmittedDT,DueDT,DeadlineDT,ExpiryDT,OwnerID,ActionID,JobID,PartID,AssignedLoginID,InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetRequired WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCDigitalID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCDigital WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCParameterID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Offset,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCParameter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartClassificationID,PartClassification,RfPartClassificationID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductionStopReasonID,ProductionStopReason,Description,StopCode,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,RfStopRelativeToJobID,IsPlanned,IsDefaultNoJobReason,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonID,ScrapReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartControlLimitID,SPCChartComponentID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,FromDT,ToDT,RangeToDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RangeFromDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefID,TagOwnerID,RfTable,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagTreeNodeID,TagTreeNode,TagTreeID,ParentTagTreeNodeID,Depth,SortOrder,ImageURI,NoCols,NoRows,SortExpression,ImageWidth,ImageHeight, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,PartID,FromDT,ToDT,Downtime,Total_Time,Uptime, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Jobs_In_Shifts WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityStateReasonID,ToolTypeID,ToolCavityStateReason,Description,CavityStatusCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavityStateReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,StartUsingComments,ToolChangeComments,StartLoginID,ChangeLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedChangeDT,SavedStartDT,SavedChangeDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedToolUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableID,VariableTypeID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Variable WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Line.LineID, Line.Line, Line.Description, Line.LineTypeID, Line.IsRetired, Line.RfIntervalModeID, Line.IsOEEInventoryIsolation, Line.IsOEEInventoryReintroduction, Line.IsCountOutputInventory, Line.IsCountInputInventory, Line.IsLineInfoSweepEnabled, Line.IsWOOnSingleJob, Line.LineShortName, Line.CurrentLineInfoID, Line.LastLineInfoID, Line.RfInvCreatedDateModeID, Line.RfEndJobInvModeID, Line.CurrentJobID, Line.IsScrapAsQualityLoss, Line.IsScrapInProductionCounts, Line.LineDownCostPerHour, Line.IsContributeLineGroupOutput, Line.IsContributeLineGroupWaste, Line.IsContributeLineGroupDowntime, Line_.OEETarget, Line_.WasteTarget, Line_.Reference1, Line_.Reference2, Line_.Reference3, Line_.Reference4, Line_.Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM Line FULL JOIN Line_ ON (Line.LineID = Line_.LineID) FULL JOIN Line_Custom ON (Line.LineID = Line_Custom.LineID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
